name: harbormaster
description: Project-aware window titles for VS Code.

projectWindowTitle.configFile.description: Relative path to the config file containing the project name.

projectWindowTitle.projectNameKey.description: JSON key to read from the config file.

projectWindowTitle.headlessPrefix.description: Prefix used when no project name is found.

projectWindowTitle.namedFormat.description: Template used when a project name is present.

projectWindowTitle.showVersion.description: When true, appends the project version if available.

projectWindowTitle.projectVersionKey.description: JSON key containing the project version.

projectWindowTitle.versionFormat.description: Template used when showVersion is true and a version is available.
